review: I love it! I have been trying for a very long time to get rid of any cable service period because I just cannot afford to waste my money when all I seem to do is watch commercials. The Fire Stick allows me to get all my shows from Netflix and Hulu, plus I love the fact you can search on YouTube + all the prime shows and prime movies. It did take me a little bit to get a hang of it because one feature I don't care for is it only shows "recommended" prime shows and movies and not the Full selections. However, I am about to buy a second one and I am just amazed that I wasted so much money when I could have just purchased this and paid a couple small monthly subscriptions.
author: Vince C.
